page.title: 09LANDSCAPE
page.content: {LANDSCAPE The sector reflects the landscape of the western outskirts of Scunthorpe.The western edge of the sector runs along the bank of the River Trent and then the sector runs in a north easterly direction to Scunthorpe.At first we have flat agricultural land but as the sector reaches Scunthorpe the land rises up a ridge.Here the ridge is known as Atkinsons Warren.It begins as a large area of deciduous woodland but as the ridge rises this is replaced by sandy heathland.At the top of the ridge is another area of woodland but this is mainly composed of coniferous trees.
